panels.description: kWp is the peak power of a PV system or panel. Solar panel systems are given a rating in kilowatts peak (kWp) which is the rate at which they generate energy at peak performance, such as on a sunny day in the afternoon.
panels.title: Theoretically maximal power

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=curPower_every5_min" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)

mappings.text: Power grid phase wire short-circuit to PE

targets.query: SELECT distinct("value") FROM "Power=allCapacity_every5_min" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("value") FROM "Power=total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=day" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=month" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT distinct("value") FROM "Power=yearly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=yearly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=hourly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none) tz('UTC')
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=hourly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none) tz('UTC')
SELECT mean("value")  /1000 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value")  /1000 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value")  /1000 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value")  *80/100*0.59 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "autogen"."Power=hasinverter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

targets.alias: Energy battery Storage LG Chem HV or Huawei LUNA
